sentences.en: A brief rest restored the traveler's vigor.
sentences.cn: 经过短暂的休息，那些旅行者又恢复了精力。

sentences.en: A succinct style lends vigor to writing.
sentences.cn: 措辞简练使文笔有力。

sentences.en: He lost his accustomed vigor and languished in the troplcal climate.
sentences.cn: 他失去了他惯有的活力,在热带气候中变得无精打采?

sentences.en: I definitely felt a deterioration in vigor.
sentences.cn: 我自感体力已退化了.

sentences.en: If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.
sentences.cn: 如果你想保持青春活力，你就得经常锻炼。

sentences.en: In fact, the huge inheritance does not do him any good, but tends to undermine his vigor and passion for life.
sentences.cn: 实际上，这么大笔的遗产对他不仅没有什么好处，反而会损害他的活力和对生活的激情。

sentences.en: It can not impair the intellectual vigor of the young.
sentences.cn: 这不能磨灭青年人思想活力.

sentences.en: President Clinton displayed no lack of vigor when he began to speak.
sentences.cn: 克林顿总统开腔时颇有气势。

sentences.en: Pruning increases the vigor of a plant.
sentences.cn: 整枝能使植物更加茁壮地生长.

sentences.en: Reduced vigor or " inbreeding depression " is not an invariable consequence of inbreeding.
sentences.cn: 降低生活力或 “ 近亲繁殖的衰退 ” 并不是近亲繁殖必然的后果.

sentences.en: She didn't want to be reminded of her beauty or her former vigor.
sentences.cn: 现在,她不愿人们提起她昔日的美丽和以前的精力充沛.

sentences.en: The choir sang the words out with great vigor.
sentences.cn: 合唱团以极大的热情唱出了歌词.

sentences.en: There was nothing feverish or hectic about his vigor ( Erik Erikson )
sentences.cn: 他精力充沛但却毫不忙乱或狂热 ( 埃里克埃里克森 )

sentences.en: They are here to drink in vigor from the youth.
sentences.cn: 他们来这里是想从年轻人身上得到活力。

sentences.en: They believe that many of these industries are hazardous and even fatal to human health, this monstrous system may deprive us the vigor and potential to enjoy our life and the products it produces.
sentences.cn: 他们认为，这些行业中的许多都是危险的，甚至是致命的人类健康，这种可怕的系统可能会剥夺我们的活力和潜力，享受我们的生活和产品，它产生。

sentences.en: They would be lying there in the tree like, 'Oh, just let me just die up here, ' because they lacked any kind of vigor.
sentences.cn: 因为它们一点活力都没有, 他们会整天在树下躺着，一付‘噢，实在活不起了，让我死在这里好了’的样子。

sentences.en: Those left on the farm will lose political vigor with advance of years .
sentences.cn: 那些留在农场的人随着年代的推移将失去政治的活力。

sentences.en: Those left on the farm will lose political vigor with the advance of years.
sentences.cn: 那些留在农场的人随着年代的推移将失去政治的活力.

sentences.en: Use of named rootstocks of known vigor did not begin until the sixteenth century.
sentences.cn: 十六世纪以前,还没开始利用已经知道生长势的知名砧木.

sentences.en: Vigor or weakness results respectively from energy or carelessness.
sentences.cn: 语言生动见之于语言功底;语言乏力出自泛泛而论.

sentences.en: Wait, please; you betray too much vigor, too much decision; you want more of a shamble.
sentences.cn: 您先别忙; 这可显着太有精神, 太有决断了; 还得再带点儿磨磨蹭蹭的样子才成.

trans.tran_cn: <美>（法律上的）效力，智力，（语言等的）气势，（动，植物的）强健
